intro: In the near future, a weary Logan cares for an ailing Professor X at a remote outpost on the Mexican border. His plan to hide from the outside world gets upended when he meets a young mutant (Laura/X-23) who is very much like him. Logan must now protect the girl and battle the dark forces (The Reavers and X-24) that want to capture her.

El Paso.description:
Logan wakes up in his car and hears gang members trying to steal his rims to sell 
.Logan: ...Uh. Please stop, guys. Those,.. those are chrome plated lugs.
Gang members: **They shoot him in the chest and Logan  falls over**
Logan:…….Fuck…..Guys... seriously...(gets to his feet).You don’t wanna do this.

Oklahoma City.description:
**Logan gets a call about a job and learns the truth about Laura**

Gabriela: Logan, Laura is a clone of you, she’s your daughter.

Reaver's Lair.description: Help Mystique so you can get money to buy a boat for yourself and professor X, Break into Revear's to help Mystique gather the documentation .

North Mexico.description:
After you failed to rescue Gabriela on time, you quickly drive back to the old factory. 
nPierce, after mutants, arrives there, looking for the Laura and Charles...After Laura hits Pierece, Caliban gets captured by the meavers...Then they attack the factory. 
You put Charles in the lemo and better try to escape...
Laura however still is in the factory...
Do you want to rescue Laura?

Save Caliban.description:
Rescue Caliban from capture!
Caliban is suffering a lot from the tortures and hasn't quite gave up on his fellows. He is held in a fully secured van and with Laura and Charles super powers you might have shot!
You gotta make it fast and quick, get in take caliban, and get out...MAKE SURE YOU HAVE HIGH HEALTH LEVEL...RISK IS HIGH, KILL EM FAST...

North Dakota.description:
As you enter you see a billboard that reads 
WELCOME TO CORN COUNTRY: HEART OF AMERICA. 
Fields on either side of the endless ribbon of road. In the fields are HUGE AUTOMATED THRESHERS/HARVESTERS. The machines are several times bigger than what we see on farms today. 
You see: 
THE FAMILY TOWING THE HORSE TRAILER ARE RUN OFF THE ROAD by 
one of the SAME CAREENING MEGA TRUCKS. Their horse trailer tipping onto its side at an angle, its doors swinging wide.

Do you want to help them to catch horses or keep moving?

The Munson Family.description:
You are invited for a decent meal, to show the appreciation!
The Munson family and the “Howlett” family all sit around a table covered with food, heads bowed as the son says grace. 
All except Laura who looks around at the family pictures, the religious decorations (they are everywhere), the warm furnishings. Another strange place.
Suddenly you hear a vehicle voice outside and realize that The Reavers arrive to capture you and Laura (X-23).

You have a choice to run and save Laura, but you put to risk The Munson family or fight but risk your own life and Laura's?

Eden.Main Mission: Survive and be Happy, Logan and X are dead
Eden.description: You've reached the end. Then you can transport Laura and the young mutants to safety
